description: At Br&newweddings we specialise in creating one of a kind stationery for each and every couple. We donâ€™t work from templates which means that your stationery suite will be completely unique and exclusive to you and your day.
exhibitText: Our founder & designer Freya and her husband are expecting their first baby in October (yey) so we regret that we are not taking any more bookings that require design work between Oct 2017 - January 2018. If your wedding is in Spring 2018 or later do get in touch so we can look at the schedule.
